justification: Mentions B’s schedule focus and offers RB depth, but ignores B’s strong preference for possession receivers and reliance on expert rankings. Mislabels Ethan Turner (Tier 4) as a TE upgrade over B’s Darian Taylor (Tier 2). A’s claim of acquiring a steadier WR is weak since Mason Torres is an outside, mid-variance option. Trade would also thin B’s WR depth. Some two-sided reasoning exists, but rationale is brief and partially inaccurate.
